verbs.description: [ARG0: redskins cheerleaders] [V: tell] [ARG2: new york times] [ARG1: about an inappropriate trip to costa rica] [ARGM-TMP: wednesday afternoon] the new york times released an article describing a washington redskins cheerleading trip that crossed several lines the report shares details of sponsors and fedexfield suite holders all men that were granted access to the photo shoots stephanie jojokian occidental grand papagayo costa rica lon roseberg washington redskins culebra bay the redskins trip
